column4: So I finally got my speakers to work on my laptop with the ALSA drivers (?). But, when I plug headphones in, the external speakers don't turn off - I'm getting sound through both the headphones and speakers...
hehehe,   you need to go into your mixer
and cut the ext speaker down
you have seperate volume controls in the mixer for headphone / external
I dunno whayt yuou use tho
you should see the right things in there
just hit "m" over the external devices
I think you can save presets
so like you stick yer hphone in and just hit like ctrl-2 and load it
I forget the exact manner of doing os though
